title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the 'Finish' button, the JAR creation process fails with the error message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.
OB: I am unable to create a JAR with unsaved editors. There is no option to save the files before creating the JAR.
EB: I expect to be able to save the unsaved editors before creating the JAR. There should be a dialog that allows me to save the files or continue without saving.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Open the JAR packager wizard.2. Have some unsaved editors.3. Press the 'Finish' button to create the JAR.
